SELECT b.*, a.`acc_name`, a.`acc_id`, a.`acc_state`, a.`province_no`, a.`acc_thumbs`, c.`room_checkIn`, c.`room_checkOut`, b.`res_checkIn`, b.`res_checkOut`, b.`res_state`, IFNULL(d.`arti_no`, 0) AS diaryStat, IFNULL(e.`res_no`, 0) AS reviewStat FROM `lemo_product_accommodation` AS a LEFT JOIN `lemo_product_reservation` AS b ON a.`acc_id` = b.`acc_id` LEFT JOIN `lemo_product_room` AS c ON b.`room_id` = c.`room_id` LEFT JOIN `lemo_diary_article` AS d ON b.`res_no` = d.`res_no` LEFT JOIN `lemo_product_review` AS e ON b.`res_no` = e.`res_no` WHERE b.`user_id` = #{user_id} ORDER BY b.`res_date` DESC LIMIT #{offset}, 10;

SELECT a.*, b.*, c.*, IFNULL(d.`dis_price`, 0) AS `dis_price`, IFNULL(e.`poi_point`, 0) AS `poi_point` FROM `lemo_product_reservation` AS a LEFT JOIN `lemo_product_room` AS b ON a.`room_id` = b.`room_id` LEFT JOIN `lemo_product_accommodation` AS c ON a.`acc_id` = c.`acc_id` LEFT JOIN `lemo_member_coupon_log` AS d ON a.`res_no` = d.`res_no` LEFT JOIN `lemo_member_point_log` AS e ON a.`res_no` = e.`res_no` WHERE a.`res_no` = #{res_no} AND a.`user_id` = #{user_id};

SELECT COUNT(a.`acc_name`) FROM `lemo_product_accommodation` AS a LEFT JOIN `lemo_product_reservation` AS b ON a.`acc_id` = b.`acc_id` LEFT JOIN `lemo_product_room` AS c ON b.`room_id` = c.`room_id` WHERE b.`user_id` = #{user_id}
